[bd] Tag Me: You can set a maximum tags in a message here. If the poster tagged too many people, he / she won't be able to submit. To set no limitation (which I don't recommend), just set it to zero (0).

[bd] Tag Me: Select how you want this add-on alter the post to display tagged users. The "Custom" mode will make the link customizable via template bdtagme_tag. The "URL" mode will make use of the standard [URL] BBCode.
Remove "@"
[bd] Tag Me: Enable this option to automatically remove the "@" symbol after a successful tag.
Suggestion Maximum Length

The javascript suggestion (for the WYSIWYG editor and standard editors) normally supports only single-word usernames. If you want it to support multi-word usernames, you can set the maximum length of suggestion here. The script will ignore word boundary and suggest username as long as the maximum length. To let it work as normal, set this option to zero (0).
